Ron Lifton

Ron has many years of enterprise and service provider marketing experience at several companies, including startups and a Fortune 100 company. He is currently Director, Solutions Marketing responsible for positioning NETSCOUT service assurance and security solutions for the enterprise market with technology partners. Prior to NETSCOUT, Ron headed product management for a cybersecurity startup that applies machine learning and behavioral analytics to network traffic flows. He has previously held senior worldwide marketing positions within Cisco and other tech companies.

Lauren Womack

As senior marketing program manager for service provider products, Lauren Womack increases brand awareness and brings relevant technical data to communications service providers (CSPs) about NETSCOUT solutions and how they can maximize emerging technologies for outstanding customer experience and network assurance.
